jd_cache.software engineer: Looking for expertise in Java, Python, C++, data structures, algorithms, and system design. Experience with RESTful APIs, SQL/NoSQL databases, cloud platforms (AWS, GCP), Docker, and Kubernetes is required.
jd_cache.ai engineer: Proficiency in Python, Machine Learning algorithms, and Deep Learning frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch. Strong skills in MLOps, model deployment, and scaling AI solutions leveraging cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP.
jd_cache.data scientist: Seeking expertise in Python, SQL, Machine Learning, Deep Learning (TensorFlow/PyTorch), and Natural Language Processing. Proficiency in statistical modeling, data visualization tools, and cloud platforms (AWS/GCP) is also key.
jd_cache.cloud engineer: Looking for expertise in AWS, Azure, GCP, Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, CloudFormation), containerization (Docker, Kubernetes), CI/CD pipelines, and scripting (Python, Bash). Strong understanding of cloud networking, security, and monitoring tools is essential.
jd_cache.agentic developer: Proficiency in designing and developing autonomous AI agents, leveraging LLMs, LangChain/LlamaIndex, and vector databases. Expertise in prompt engineering, RAG, tool integration, and multi-agent orchestration is essential.
jd_cache.ai developer: Proficiency in Python, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and AI frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch. Expertise in natural language processing, computer vision, and deploying AI models on cloud platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure).
jd_cache.software development engineer: Seeking strong proficiency in multiple programming languages (e.g., Java, Python, Go), Data Structures & Algorithms, and software design principles. Expertise in developing scalable APIs, working with SQL/NoSQL databases, and cloud platforms (AWS/Azure/GCP) is crucial.
jd_cache.data science: Proficiency required in Python, R, SQL, statistical modeling, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning. Expertise needed with key frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch), data visualization tools, and cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure).
jd_cache.sde role: Looking for expertise in programming languages like Java, Python, Go, Data Structures, Algorithms, and Distributed System Design. Requires hands-on experience with SQL/NoSQL databases, RESTful APIs, microservices, and cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP.
jd_cache.software developer: Expertise in core programming languages (e.g., Java, Python, C#, JavaScript), modern web frameworks (e.g., Spring Boot, Node.js, React), and database technologies (SQL, NoSQL). Skilled in RESTful API design, microservices architecture, and Git.
jd_cache.ml engineer:
Looking for expertise in Python, machine learning algorithms, deep learning frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch), and data pipelines.
Proficiency required in MLOps, model serving, Docker, Kubernetes, and cloud platforms like AWS or GCP.
jd_cache.associate system architect:
Seeking expertise in modern system design principles, architectural patterns (microservices, event-driven), and cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP).
Proficiency in containerization (Docker, Kubernetes), Infrastructure as Code (Terraform), and API design/integration is essential.

data scientist.title: Data Scientist Consultant
data scientist.description: Work with diverse clients across industries to solve complex data challenges. Design and implement end-to-end data science solutions, from data ingestion and cleaning to model deployment and performance monitoring. Strong communication skills, project management, and a broad toolkit in Python/R, SQL, and cloud ML platforms (e.g., Azure ML, GCP AI Platform) are required for client-facing engagements.

data scientist.title: Senior Data Scientist, Product Analytics
data scientist.description: Drive product innovation by developing and deploying machine learning models to understand user behavior, optimize features, and predict trends. Analyze large, complex datasets, build predictive analytics solutions, and collaborate with engineering teams to integrate models into production systems. Requires strong Python, SQL, experience with cloud platforms (AWS/Azure/GCP), and expertise in various ML algorithms and A/B testing.

data scientist.title: Data Scientist, Fraud & Risk Management
data scientist.description: Design, implement, and monitor machine learning models to detect and prevent financial fraud and assess credit risk. Work with massive transactional datasets, apply advanced statistical techniques, and provide actionable insights to business stakeholders and regulatory teams. Proficient in Python/R, SQL, and experience with anomaly detection, time series analysis, and model interpretability is essential.

data scientist.title: Lead Data Scientist, Personalization & Recommendations
data scientist.description: Lead initiatives to enhance customer personalization and recommendation engines across our e-commerce platform. Develop and optimize ML models for user segmentation, content recommendations, and churn prediction. Mentor junior data scientists, drive A/B testing frameworks, and integrate models with real-time systems. Expertise in Python, Spark, collaborative filtering, and deep learning for recommenders is crucial.

ai developer.title: Junior AI Developer
ai developer.description: Develop and implement AI models, primarily focusing on data preprocessing, model training, and API integration. Collaborate with senior engineers to deploy scalable solutions. Skills: Python, TensorFlow/PyTorch, basic ML algorithms, strong problem-solving.

ai developer.title: Full Stack AI Developer
ai developer.description: Build end-to-end AI-powered features for our core product. This role involves developing ML models, integrating them into backend services, and potentially contributing to frontend components. Skills: Python, Flask/Django, JavaScript (React/Angular), SQL, cloud platform experience, model deployment.

ai developer.title: AI Developer (Machine Learning Engineer)
ai developer.description: Design, build, and maintain robust machine learning pipelines and production-grade AI systems. Focus on model deployment, MLOps, and performance optimization. Skills: Python, AWS/Azure/GCP, Docker, Kubernetes, strong ML engineering background.

ai developer.title: AI Developer (Computer Vision)
ai developer.description: Develop and optimize computer vision algorithms for robotic perception and autonomous navigation. Work with real-time image and sensor data, focusing on object detection, tracking, and 3D reconstruction. Skills: Python, OpenCV, TensorFlow/PyTorch, C++ a plus, experience with real-time systems.

ai developer.title: Senior AI Developer, Natural Language Processing
ai developer.description: Lead the development of advanced NLP models for text understanding, generation, and summarization. Research cutting-edge techniques (LLMs, Transformers) and mentor junior team members. Skills: Python, PyTorch/Hugging Face, deep understanding of NLP, experience with large datasets.
